attributes.action: WE DEMAND TOUGHER PENALTIES FOR ILLEGAL PARKING OUTSIDE SCHOOLS
attributes.additional_details:
It is illegal to park on the Yellow Zig Zags outside schools;

The Highway Code - Waiting and parking (238)
You MUST NOT wait or park, or stop to set down and pick up passengers, on school entrance markings.

It clearly states this here: https://www.gov.uk/waiting-and-parking/waiting-and-parking-238

"Yet, every day people still do this, at almost every school around the UK"

It is quite obvious that:
- These people DO NOT care
- There is NOT ENOUGH being done to STOP these people
- Somewhere, the LAW is FAILING
- Something needs to be done NOW!!!

Our children require much TOUGHER laws and penalties against those people that threaten their lives on a daily basis. The current system does NOT work.

To the Home Office,
'PLEASE ACT NOW'
